sentences.sContent: Linus Pauling is an unconventional genius.
He was known for his unconventional behaviour.
sentences.sCn: 他曾因另类行为而出名。

synos.tran: 非常规的；非传统的；不依惯例的

trans.tranCn: 非传统的, 不合惯例的
trans.tranOther: If you describe a person or their attitude or behaviour as unconventional, you mean that they do not behave in the same way as most other people in their society
